spec.name: The 24 rooftop
spec.description: The 24 Rooftop is a modern restaurant, bar, and lounge located on the rooftop (likely the 24th floor) of a high-rise building in Casablanca's central district. It specializes in offering an **International menu** alongside drinks, capitalizing on its elevated position to provide **panoramic city views**. It is a popular spot for sophisticated evening socializing and entertainment.
